QueryResult.text: SELECT RESOURCES.ID AS ID, RESOURCES.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, RESOURCES.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, RESOURCES.FULL_NAME AS FULL_NAME, RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME AS UNIQUE_NAME, RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME AS UNIQUE_CODE, RESOURCES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS LAST_UPDATED_DATE FROM SRM_RESOURCES RESOURCES WHERE 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND RESOURCES.PERSON_TYPE != 0
